messages.subject: Commercial message, Aizu Kanesada for sale.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Guys/Gals, I have just added a sword to my site. It is a 3rd Generation Aizu Kanesada Wakizashi with 2 battle scars and NTHK papers. Here is the link
messages.messageBody:
Hi Guys/Gals,

I have just added a sword to my site. It is a 3rd Generation Aizu
Kanesada
Wakizashi with 2 battle scars and NTHK papers.

Here is the link www.japaneseswordcollector.com

If you have any questions please ask.

Regards,

Louis Skebo
